kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: :FOR

kw.status: Support for the old FOR loop syntax has been removed. Replace ':FOR' with 'FOR', end the loop with 'END', and remove escaping backslashes.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.
Hace scroll hasta que el <li> de la pista n esté en el DOM/viewport.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Opción B: hace hover sobre el <li> de la pista en la playlist y abre el menú contextual.

kw.arg: Open More Menu From Playlist By Hover
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
kw.status: Support for the old FOR loop syntax has been removed. Replace ':FOR' with 'FOR', end the loop with 'END', and remove escaping backslashes.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.arg: Open More Menu On Track Page
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
Decide si abre por hover (playlist) o abriendo la página de pista y allí el menú.
kw.status: Support for the old FOR loop syntax has been removed. Replace ':FOR' with 'FOR', end the loop with 'END', and remove escaping backslashes.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: xpath=//a[(contains(@class,'sc-link') or contains(@class,'download')) and (contains(.,'Download') or contains(@href,'/download'))]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Wait For New Download
kw.doc: Espera a que aparezca un nuevo archivo y a que termine (desaparece .crdownload).
Abre el menú (según OPEN_METHOD), clica Download (si existe) y espera el archivo.
kw.status: Support for the old FOR loop syntax has been removed. Replace ':FOR' with 'FOR', end the loop with 'END', and remove escaping backslashes.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.doc: Usa OPEN_METHOD=hover (menú en la lista). El botón puede no ofrecer Download.
test.status: Support for the old FOR loop syntax has been removed. Replace ':FOR' with 'FOR', end the loop with 'END', and remove escaping backslashes.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

suite.doc: SoundCloud downloader – dos modos de abrir el menú (click en pista vs hover en playlist) y descargar si está disponible.
